verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH6258> now שָֽׂחֲק֣וּ <WH7832> than I have me in derision עָלַי֮ <WH5921> and צְעִירִ֥ים <WH6810> those מִמֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> than לְיָ֫מִ֥ים <WH3117> age אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whose מָאַ֥סְתִּי <WH3988> I would have disdained אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> whose fathers לָ֝שִׁ֗ית <WH7896> to have set עִם־ <WH5973> with כַּלְבֵ֥י <WH3611> with the dogs צֹאנִֽי׃ <WH6629> of my flock

גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> [might] the strength יְ֭דֵיהֶם <WH3027> of their hands לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Yea whereto לִּ֑י עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> and אָ֣בַד <WH6> was perished כָּֽלַח׃ <WH3624> [profit] me in whom old age

בְּחֶ֥סֶר <WH2639> For want וּבְכָפָ֗ן <WH3720> and famine גַּ֫לְמ֥וּד <WH1565> [they were] solitary הַֽעֹרְקִ֥ים <WH6207> fleeing צִיָּ֑ה <WH6723> into the wilderness אֶ֝֗מֶשׁ <WH570> in former time שׁוֹאָ֥ה <WH7722> desolate וּמְשֹׁאָֽה׃ <WH4875> and waste

הַקֹּטְפִ֣ים <WH6998> Who cut up מַלּ֣וּחַ <WH4408> mallows עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> by שִׂ֑יחַ <WH7880> by the bushes וְשֹׁ֖רֶשׁ <WH8328> roots רְתָמִ֣ים <WH7574> and juniper לַחְמָֽם׃ <WH3899> [for] their meat
מִן־ <WH4480> from גֵּ֥ו <WH1460> from among יְגֹרָ֑שׁוּ <WH1644> They were driven forth יָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> [men] (they cried עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> against כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <WH1590> as a thief
בַּעֲר֣וּץ <WH6178> in the clifts נְחָלִ֣ים <WH5158> of the valleys לִשְׁכֹּ֑ן <WH7931> To dwell חֹרֵ֖י <WH2356> [in] caves עָפָ֣ר <WH6083> of the earth וְכֵפִֽים׃ <WH3710> and [in] the rocks
בֵּין־ <WH996> Among שִׂיחִ֥ים <WH7880> Among the bushes יִנְהָ֑קוּ <WH5101> they brayed תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Under חָר֣וּל <WH2738> under the nettles יְסֻפָּֽחוּ׃ <WH5596> they were gathered together

בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> [They were] children נָ֭בָל <WH5036> of fools גַּם־ <WH1571> even בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> yea children בְלִי־ <WH1097> without שֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> of base men נִ֝כְּא֗וּ <WH5217> they were viler מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> than the earth
וְ֭עַתָּה <WH6258> and now נְגִינָתָ֣ם <WH5058> And now am I their song הָיִ֑יתִי <WH1961> have become וָאֱהִ֖י <WH1961> become לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like לְמִלָּֽה׃ <WH4405> yea I am their byword

תִּֽ֭עֲבוּנִי <WH8581> They abhor רָ֣חֲקוּ <WH7368> me they flee far מֶ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וּ֝מִפָּנַ֗י <WH6440> in my face לֹא־ <WH3808> not חָ֥שְׂכוּ <WH2820> from me and spare רֹֽק׃ <WH7536> not to spit

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because [יִתְרֹו כ] (יִתְרִ֣י <WH3499> abundant ק) פִ֭תַּח <WH6605> Because he hath loosed וַיְעַנֵּ֑נִי <WH6031> and afflicted וְ֝רֶ֗סֶן <WH7448> the bridle מִפָּנַ֥י <WH6440> before שִׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7971> me they have also let loose

עַל־ <WH5921> against יָמִין֮ <WH3225> Upon [my] right פִּרְחַ֪ח <WH6526> the youth יָ֫ק֥וּמוּ <WH6965> [hand] rise רַגְלַ֥י <WH7272> my feet שִׁלֵּ֑חוּ <WH7971> they push away וַיָּסֹ֥לּוּ <WH5549> and they raise up עָ֝לַ֗י <WH5921> against אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> against me the ways אֵידָֽם׃ <WH343> of their destruction
נָתְס֗וּ <WH5420> They mar נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <WH5410> my path לְהַוָּתִֽי <WH1942> my destruction יֹעִ֑ילוּ <WH3276> they set forward לֹ֖א <WH3808> No עֹזֵ֣ר <WH5826> they have no helper לָֽמוֹ׃
כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6556> breaking רָחָ֣ב <WH7342> [upon me] as a wide יֶאֱתָ֑יוּ <WH857> They came תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> in [of waters] in שֹׁ֝אָ֗ה <WH7722> the desolation הִתְגַּלְגָּֽלוּ׃ <WH1556> they rolled

הָהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> are turned עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against בַּלָּ֫ה֥וֹת <WH1091> Terrors תִּרְדֹּ֣ף <WH7291> upon me they pursue כָּ֭רוּחַ <WH7307> as the wind נְדִבָתִ֑י <WH5082> my soul וּ֝כְעָ֗ב <WH5645> as a cloud עָבְרָ֥ה <WH5674> passeth away יְשֻׁעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> and my welfare

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now עָ֭לַי <WH5921> within תִּשְׁתַּפֵּ֣ךְ <WH8210> is poured out נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> And now my soul יֹ֖אחֲז֣וּנִי <WH270> have taken hold יְמֵי־ <WH3117> upon me the days עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> of affliction

לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> in me in the night season עֲ֭צָמַי <WH6106> My bones נִקַּ֣ר <WH5365> are pierced מֵעָלָ֑י <WH5921> and וְ֝עֹרְקַ֗י <WH6207> and my sinews לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִשְׁכָּבֽוּן׃ <WH7901> take no rest

בְּרָב־ <WH7227> in abundance כֹּ֭חַ <WH3581> force יִתְחַפֵּ֣שׂ <WH2664> changed לְבוּשִׁ֑י <WH3830> [of my disease] is my garment כְּפִ֖י <WH6310> as the collar כֻתָּנְתִּ֣י <WH3801> of my coat יַֽאַזְרֵֽנִי׃ <WH247> it bindeth me about
הֹרָ֥נִי <WH3384> He hath cast לַחֹ֑מֶר <WH2563> me into the mire וָ֝אֶתְמַשֵּׁ֗ל <WH4911> and I am become like כֶּעָפָ֥ר <WH6083> dust וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> and ashes

אֲשַׁוַּ֣ע <WH7768> I cry אֵ֭לֶיךָ <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> unto thee and thou dost not hear עָ֝מַ֗דְתִּי <WH5975> me I stand up וַתִּתְבֹּ֥נֶן <WH995> and thou regardest בִּֽי׃
תֵּהָפֵ֣ךְ <WH2015> Thou art become לְאַכְזָ֣ר <WH393> cruel לִ֑י בְּעֹ֖צֶם <WH6108> to me with thy strong יָדְךָ֣ <WH3027> hand תִשְׂטְמֵֽנִי׃ <WH7852> thou opposest

תִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <WH5375> Thou liftest me up אֶל־ <WH413> to ר֭וּחַ <WH7307> to the wind תַּרְכִּיבֵ֑נִי <WH7392> thou causest me to ride וּ֝תְמֹגְגֵ֗נִי <WH4127> [upon it] and dissolvest [תְּשֻׁוֶּה כ] (תּוּשִׁיָּֽה׃ <WH7738> substance ק)

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> For I know מָ֣וֶת <WH4194> me [to] death תְּשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <WH7725> [that] thou wilt bring וּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> and [to] the house מוֹעֵ֣ד <WH4150> appointed לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all חָֽי׃ <WH2416> for all living

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Yet לֹא־ <WH3808> not בְ֭עִי <WH1164> to the grave יִשְׁלַח־ <WH7971> Howbeit he will not stretch out יָ֑ד <WH3027> [his] hand אִם־ <WH518> Or בְּ֝פִיד֗וֹ <WH6365> in his destruction לָהֶ֥ן <WH3861> but שֽׁוּעַ׃ <WH7769> though they cry
אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בָ֭כִיתִי <WH1058> Did not I weep לִקְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish י֑וֹם <WH3117> life עָֽגְמָ֥ה <WH5701> grieved נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> any לָאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> to the poor

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When ט֣וֹב <WH2896> for good קִ֭וִּיתִי <WH6960> When I looked וַיָּ֣בֹא <WH935> came רָ֑ע <WH7451> then evil וַֽאֲיַחֲלָ֥ה <WH3176> [unto me] and when I waited לְ֝א֗וֹר <WH216> for light וַיָּ֥בֹא <WH935> there came אֹֽפֶל׃ <WH652> darkness
מֵעַ֖י <WH4578> My bowels רֻתְּח֥וּ <WH7570> boiled וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and cannot דָ֗מּוּ <WH1826> and rested קִדְּמֻ֥נִי <WH6923> prevented יְמֵי־ <WH3117> not the days עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> of affliction

קֹדֵ֣ר <WH6937> mourning הִ֭לַּכְתִּי <WH1980> I went בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> without חַמָּ֑ה <WH2535> without the sun קַ֖מְתִּי <WH6965> I stood up בַקָּהָ֣ל <WH6951> in the congregation אֲשַׁוֵּֽעַ׃ <WH7768> [and] I cried
אָ֭ח <WH251> I am a brother הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> have become לְתַנִּ֑ים <WH8577> to dragons וְ֝רֵ֗עַ <WH7453> and a companion לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3284> owl
ע֭וֹרִי <WH5785> My skin שָׁחַ֣ר <WH7835> is black מֵעָלָ֑י <WH5921> on וְעַצְמִי־ <WH6106> upon me and my bones חָ֝֗רָה <WH2787> are burned מִנִּי־ <WH4480> with חֹֽרֶב׃ <WH2721> with heat

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> is turned לְ֭אֵבֶל <WH60> also is [turned] to mourning כִּנֹּרִ֑י <WH3658> My harp וְ֝עֻגָבִ֗י <WH5748> and my organ לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> into the voice בֹּכִֽים׃ <WH1058> of them that weep
